name: Beatroots
description:
Art: Aleksandra Pietraszek, Joanna Zub

Design & Music: Jakub Apostolski

Programming: Dominik Majchrzak

Beat(s) Roots is a game of eternal struggle of man against nature, a rhythm of inner desires fighting with his human pride, as everchanging as the year's seasons, his strive to best forces of nature and dominate all living things on the planets, however personification of nature's lust called Rootsy has his eyes (many) on him and in the end he will not resist her temptation of slimy vines and tentaclous roots
